Author: Caffe_Americano
Text: I looooove peppermint tea and can confirm it works great for soothing digestive issues. It’s no magic pill but there is science behind it! https://www.healthline.com/nutrition/peppermint-tea#section1

Author: SlutForGarrus
Text: I know it sounds like a folk remedy, but when you have that awful bloated feeling, drink some mint tea. The nurses shoved it in my face nonstop after my most recent surgery, because apparently it helps with the bloating you get from having air trapped in your abdomen.  It’s not magic, but it’s 3 calories and certainly can’t hurt, and is definitely safer than purging. I put a *little* miralax in if I need to, but I’m not a purger really so there’s no slippery slope for me with that.
